::Slayer::

Slayer nods, thinking over that option. "Hmm.. I havn't thought of 
that. I was thinking we could bribe the Maximals to attack the 
Predacons. In the resulting confusion, it wouldn't be too difficult 
to snatch all our bots."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius punches up the stats, "Far as I can tell the base runs on a
> recycling system. The energeon powers the base, turning turbines 
produceing
> power that powers the base. I don't know if we could reroute it."He 
watches
> the screen , following the power system to a dropoff. "But theres a 
runoff
> for the unstable energeon. What if we collected  some from there?" 
His
> devious mind was working overtime. "The Preds wouldn't know it was 
unstable
> till it blew thier systems."
